snippet.title: StarDrive 2 Trailer
snippet.description:
Available on Steam April 9th, 2015. 

Explore, Expand, Exploit, and Exterminate. Turn-based Strategy, real-time tactics. Design ships to fight in epic battles, direct boarding actions with customized troops, use diplomacy, espionage, research,  and orbitally-deployed ordnance to bring your opponents to their heels.
